actions.text: Amendment SA 130 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 130 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 65.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 130.
Amendment SA 130 proposed by Senator Warner. To create a point of order against any reconciliation bill that would not decrease the cost of housing for American families.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 130 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 65.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 130 proposed by Senator Warner.

purpose: To create a point of order against any reconciliation bill that would not decrease the cost of housing for American families.
